lead_paragraph: Carolina quarterback Cam Newton didn't say much after the Panthers lost Super Bowl 50 on Sunday night, but the league's MVP did promise this: "We'll be back."

headline.print_headline: Newton, Panthers Vow to Get Back to Super Bowl After Loss
headline.main: Newton, Panthers Vow to Get Back to Super Bowl After Loss

snippet: Carolina quarterback Cam Newton didn't say much after the Panthers lost Super Bowl 50 on Sunday night, but the league's MVP did promise this: "We'll be back."...
